mapper.sql: id, empid, userid, roomid, sourceid, paytypeid, personnum, starttime, endtime, price, createtime, status, comment
mapper.select: SELECT t_user.username, t_user.sex, t_user.phonenumber, t_emp.username AS empname, t_apt.starttime, t_apt.endtime, t_apt.price, t_apt.createtime, t_apt.`status`, t_apt.`comment`, t_apt.personnum, t_paytype.paytype, t_room.`name`, t_source.sourcename, t_apt.id, t_apt.roomid, t_apt.sourceid, t_apt.paytypeid, t_apt.userid, t_apt.empid, t_user.money FROM t_apt INNER JOIN t_emp ON t_apt.empid = t_emp.id LEFT JOIN t_paytype ON t_paytype.id = t_apt.paytypeid INNER JOIN t_room ON t_apt.roomid = t_room.id INNER JOIN t_source ON t_apt.sourceid = t_source.id INNER JOIN t_user ON t_user.empid = t_emp.id AND t_apt.userid = t_user.id WHERE (t_user.username LIKE '%${keyword}%' OR t_user.phonenumber LIKE '%${keyword}%') AND t_apt.`status` = ${status}
